description: The Harvard guys find out Johnny Brosnan isn't who he's pretending to be and they make him pay for lying. This hot orgy has David Moretti, Ryan Michaels, Erik Hanlan, Robert Balint, Matt Spencer, Lindon Hawk and Travis Wade forcing Johnny to blow each of them, then they turn around and he expertly rims each one. They all take turns fucking Johnny and then finally, Travis Wade and Matt Spencer double-fuck Lindon Hawk.
title: Out Of Athens, Part 2, Scene #03
